description: The Katsura tree, (Cercidiphyllum japonicum 'Rotfuchs' RED FOX) is an amazing species of shade tree with spectacular, deciduous foliage. It's deep green, heart-shaped leaves turn a flaming orange-red in the Fall. The Katsura tree also has a sweet, caramel-like scent when the leaves fall off in the Autumn, making it the ideal courtyard tree. Its smooth, ovate bark has attractive pale gray patches, and in summer, tiny, reddish-yellow blooms appear in clusters, adding to its beauty. Growing quickly and adapting easily to different soils, a Katsura tree is ideal for any garden or landscape.
